name: Fusionex
description:
A. Job Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain responsive web applications using React/Vue.js
• Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement user-friendly interfaces
• Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
• Participate in code reviews and implement feedback
• Debug and fix frontend issues

B. Job Requirements / Skills:
• Currently pursuing Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
• Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frontend frameworks
• Basic understanding of version control (Git)
• Good problem-solving skills
• Strong attention to detail
• Ability to work in a team environment

C. Benefits:
• Monthly allowance
• Flexible working hours
• Professional mentorship
• Networking opportunities
• Potential for full-time conversion
• Modern office environment

name: National Instruments
description:
A. Job Responsibilities:
• Develop and implement machine learning models for data analysis
• Collect and preprocess large datasets
• Optimize existing ML models for better performance
• Create documentation for ML systems
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams

B. Job Requirements / Skills:
• Pursuing degree in Computer Science, AI, or related field
• Strong programming skills in Python
• Knowledge of ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
• Understanding of statistical analysis
• Experience with data visualization
• Good analytical and problem-solving skills

C. Benefits:
• Competitive stipend
• Learning and development opportunities
• Access to cutting-edge technology
• Team building activities
• Health and wellness programs
• Transportation allowance

name: Micro Modular System
description:
A. Job Responsibilities:
• Design and implement automation solutions for manufacturing processes
• Program and configure industrial automation equipment
• Conduct testing and troubleshooting of automated systems
• Create technical documentation and user manuals
• Support maintenance and optimization of existing systems

B. Job Requirements / Skills:
• Pursuing degree in Mechatronics, Electrical Engineering, or related field
• Knowledge of PLC programming and industrial automation
• Familiarity with automation software and tools
• Basic understanding of electrical systems
• Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities
• Good communication skills

C. Benefits:
• Monthly allowance
• Hands-on industry experience
• Technical training programs
• Safety certification opportunities
• Exposure to cutting-edge automation technology
• Transportation allowance

name: Intel
description:
A. Job Responsibilities:
• Design and develop computer hardware components
• Conduct performance testing and validation
• Create technical specifications and documentation
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams on product development
• Troubleshoot complex hardware issues
• Lead technical reviews and design meetings

B. Job Requirements / Skills:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering or related field
• 3+ years experience in hardware design
• Proficiency in circuit design and PCB layout
• Knowledge of computer architecture
• Experience with hardware debugging tools
• Strong project management skills

C. Benefits:
• Competitive salary package
• Performance bonuses
• Comprehensive medical coverage
• Stock purchase plan
• Professional development opportunities
• Work-life balance programs

name: Vitrox
description:
A. Job Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain machine vision systems
• Design image processing algorithms
• Implement quality control solutions
• Calibrate and optimize vision systems
• Provide technical support to production teams
• Document system specifications and procedures

B. Job Requirements / Skills:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering
• Experience with image processing and computer vision
• Programming skills in C++ and Python
• Knowledge of OpenCV or similar frameworks
• Understanding of lighting and optics
• Problem-solving and analytical skills

C. Benefits:
• Competitive salary
• Performance incentives
• Health insurance
• Annual leave
• Professional certification support
• Gym membership
